name: Medieval War Simulator
description:
Step into the battlefield and enjoy in this cool battles.You can deploy, select and move different units in real time.
Automatically spawned AI enemies will battle your troops and try to destroy your castles. Deploy troops like giants,
archers and knights to stop and defeat them!

Take on the epic battles, work out totally accurate strategy, conquer your enemies and seize victory! Only your wits can
bring you glory in this ultimate battle strategy puzzle.
Multiple troops are available to choose from and more to come! It is totally up to you to build your army!
Fighters with swords, shields, spears, hammers, bows, goblin,archers,Wizard,Knight with shield and more are waiting for you
to choose! Don't wait, try it now!

Single Player Mode:
Seige the castle!You will face various enemies in well-designed 20 levels with progressive difficulty.Can you defeat
powerful AI?


Multiplayer Mode:
Completely fair duel! The battle is now beginning!1 VS 1 with real players around the world!

Features:
- Real-time strategy war!
- Multiplayer challenge!
- Ragdoll and physics effects !
- Well-made, improved graphics to make the battle cooler that ever !
- Smarter troops to achieve the most accurate battle simulation !
- Awesome sounds and music variety !
